CustomField.formula: CASE(TEXT(Invoicing_Type__c), 'Prices combined into one price excluding transport price, which should be shown separately', 'ZPE1', 'Full delivered price shown only','ZPE1', 'Price components combined into one price, excluding energy surcharge, which should be shown separately','ZPE0' ,'Prices combined into one price excluding ESC and Transport price, which should each be shown separately','ZPE0','All prices shown separately','ZPE0',' ')
CustomField.label: Energy Surcharge Condition Type
